## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{mbwuglt9}
cipher: RSA
ciphertext: 6099102867655765621475212425480133549026481021698417283232152232555297813425197038591201945800916898003042961094823653968220565311212516149916477261996429
vulnerability: blum integers
hint: Blum integers are products of primes congruent to 3 modulo 4. These integers have unique properties in cryptography.
necessary_info: The flag format is flag{...}
n=9268819142616342283600871884230286873194383045179912174017349611756879551362373393782071428122696805798646468327900756880314471888794587276855515977327521, e=6191487231249727128476324373629303013683847027807487654251877727726362222503812751905267710053000380935452380641413249824077625521485606100663642475636267
